title: Adoption of modular kernel architecture
context: Needed a scalable architecture for reasoning layers
decision: Implement TimerRegistry, StateRegistry, HealthMonitor as independent modules

title: VSCode WebView for cognitive visualization
context: Users need real-time visibility into cognitive state
decision: Use VSCode WebView API with React for dashboard

title: CognitiveSnapshot as source of truth
context: Need clean contract between kernel and UI
decision: Define minimal CognitiveSnapshot interface compatible with Zustand store

title: Use JSONL for append-only ledgers
context: Need immutable event log for auditing
decision: Use .jsonl format for cycles, ADRs, RBOM events
